pages.text: 39|57|hananimkkeseo naleul indohayeo jusyeossdeolamyeon naneun uiloun jajung-e iss-eoss-eul geos-ilago malhaji anihago
39|58|neohuiga beol-eul danghayeo tto hanbeon ui gihuiga issdamyeon naneun seon-eul haengha neun jajung-e iss-eulyeonman hago malhaji anhdolog ham-ila
39|59|geuleohji anhnola neohuiege hananim-ui yejeungdeul-i ileuleossgeoneul neo huineun geugeosdeul-eul geoyeoghago omanhamyeo mid-eum-eul geoyeoghan jaga doeeossnola
39|60|simpan-ui nal hananimkke geoyeoghaess deon jadeul-eul neohuiga bolini geudeul-ui eolgul-eun geomge byeonhanola omanhan ja deul-eul wihan geojujiga jiog-i ani gessneunyo
39|61|geuleona hananim-eun uiloun ja deul-eul seungliui jangsolo indohasini eotteohan bul-undo geudeul-ege ileuji anihamyeo geudeul-egeneun seulpeumdo eobsnola
39|62|hananim-eun manmul-ui changjoju-ija modeun geos-eul jugwanhasineun bun-eulo
39|63|haneulgwa daejiui yeolsoedeul-i geubunkke iss-eo hananim-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghan geudeul-egeneun sonsilman iss-eul ppun-ila
39|64|illeogalodoe mujihan salamdeul-i yeo neohuiga nalo hayeogeum sungbaehage hal eotteon geosdeul-i issneunyo

39|65|geudae ijeon-edo geulaessdeus-i i mi geudaeegedo gyesiga iss-eossnola man-il geudaega hananimgwa deobul-eo da leun sindeul-eul seomgindamyeon geudaeui il-eun heos-sugoga doeeo modeun geos-eul sangsilha neun ja seoyeol-e issge doelila
39|66|geulihaji malla hananimman-eul gyeongbaehayeo gamsahaneun ja gaunde iss eula

39|67|geudeul-eun hananimkke haeya hal gam saleul dahaji anihayeoss-eumae simpan-ui nal daejiui modeun geos-i geubun-ui son-an e iss-eul geos-iyo haneul-i geubun-ui o leunson-e gamgige doelila geubun-ege yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo geubun-eun geudeul-i myosahaneun modeun geos wie gyesinola
